lineage.Process: CopyFeatures D:\xxzk-20101018\100w-黑瞎子岛修改20101103\ACOUPL.shp D:\xxzk-20101018\全国100万基础地理数据综合信息子库.mdb\ACOUPL # 0 0 0

Project county100wan E:\中国100万县界2000年-电子政务项目\County100wan_Albers.shp PROJCS['WGS_1984_Albers',GEOGCS['GCS_WGS_1984',DATUM['D_WGS_1984',SPHEROID['WGS_1984',6378137.0,298.257223563]],PRIMEM['Greenwich',0.0],UNIT['Degree',0.0174532925199433]],PROJECTION['Albers'],PARAMETER['False_Easting',4000000.0],PARAMETER['False_Northing',0.0],PARAMETER['Central_Meridian',105.0],PARAMETER['Standard_Parallel_1',25.0],PARAMETER['Standard_Parallel_2',47.0],PARAMETER['Latitude_Of_Origin',0.0],UNIT['Meter',1.0]] # GEOGCS['CGCS_2000',DATUM['D_2000',SPHEROID['S_2000',6378137.0,298.2572221010041]],PRIMEM['Greenwich',0.0],UNIT['Degree',0.0174532925199433]]
